project_overview.concept: ReWear is a comprehensive sustainable fashion marketplace mobile application that promotes circular economy by enabling users to buy, sell, and donate pre-owned clothing items. The platform connects multiple stakeholders - regular users, delivery drivers, charitable organizations, and administrators - in a unified ecosystem designed to reduce textile waste and extend the lifecycle of fashion items.
project_overview.mission: To create a sustainable fashion ecosystem that reduces clothing waste, promotes reusability, and supports charitable causes through seamless technology integration.

lib/.config/: Configuration files (theme, router, constants, app config)
lib/.models/: Data models and enums for domain entities
lib/.providers/: State management providers using Provider pattern

core_features.name: User Authentication
core_features.description: Secure authentication system with email verification and role-based access control
core_features.details: Login, registration with OTP verification, password recovery, session management with JWT tokens

core_features.name: Marketplace Browsing
core_features.description: Browse and search pre-owned clothing items with advanced filtering
core_features.details: Category filtering, size selection, condition filtering, price range, distance-based search, favorites system

core_features.name: Item Listing
core_features.description: List items for sale or donation with image uploads
core_features.details: Multiple image support, image cropping, detailed descriptions, pricing or donation option, location tagging

core_features.name: Shopping Cart & Checkout
core_features.details: Add to cart, quantity management, address selection, order summary, payment integration, order confirmation

core_features.name: Donation System
core_features.description: Donate items directly to registered charitable organizations
core_features.details: Charity selection, donation tracking, acceptance workflow, impact statistics

core_features.name: Delivery Management
core_features.description: Integrated delivery system with real-time tracking
core_features.details: Driver assignment, GPS tracking, delivery status updates, proof of delivery, COD support

core_features.name: Order Tracking
core_features.description: Real-time order status tracking with notifications
core_features.details: Status milestones, location tracking, driver communication, estimated delivery time

core_features.name: Notifications
core_features.description: Firebase Cloud Messaging for push notifications
core_features.details: Order updates, delivery notifications, donation alerts, promotional messages

core_features.name: Profile Management
core_features.details: Profile editing, address book management, order history, password change, account deactivation

core_features.name: Driver Portal
core_features.details: Application process, available deliveries, active delivery management, earnings tracking, delivery history

core_features.name: Charity Portal
core_features.details: Donation management, acceptance workflow, claimed items, impact statistics, pending donation review

core_features.name: Admin Dashboard
core_features.details: Driver application reviews, user management, platform oversight
